si.title: සිරියානු ජනාධිපති රටින් පලා ගියේය
body_lines: සිරියානු ජනාධිපති බාසර් අල්සෑඩ් රට හැර ගොස් තිබේ

en.title: Syrian president fled the country
body_lines: Syrian President Basar al -Assad has left the country

summary_lines: Syrian Pres. Bashar al-Assad reportedly fled the country. This news, if confirmed, would be significant as it could impact Syria's political landscape and regional stability. However, without official confirmation, details remain unclear.
